Sentence.sentence: 99 Occupational stress increases the risk of heart attack and diabetes, accelerates the aging process, decreases  longevity,  and  contributes  to  depression  and  anxiety,  among  numerous  other  negative  health  outcomes.
The legend says that when seven girls were attacked by bears, they took refuge on top of a small rock, and they appealed to the Rock God for help.
Monsanto's critics have attacked the company for its "merciless legal battles against small farmers," and they are hoping this will be the case that puts it in its place.
Robots continue to have an impact on blue-collar jobs, and white-collar jobs are under attack by microprocessors," says economics professor Edward Learner.
trillion China holds in reserve, currency traders have a heart attack
Janet James was 22 years old when she was diagnosed with MS—a disease that attacks the body's nerves.
The jury believed the testimony of the two victims, who positively identified Jackson as the man who has attacked them.
They clearly saw the man who attacked them, yet they mistakenly identified an innocent person

given the moth's ability also to attack crops like pepper and potatoes, Audu Ogbeh, Nigeria's minister of agriculture, has warned that the pest may "create serious problems for food security" in the country.
Sentence.come: 2017年12月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section A

Sentence.sentence: Occupational stress increases the risk of heart attack and diabetes, accelerates the aging process, decreases longevity, and contributes to depression and anxiety, among numerous other negative health outcomes.
Sentence.come: 2016年12月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: Once armed with a method for gaining access to iPhones, the government could ask to use it proactively, before a suspected terrorist attack—leaving Apple in a bind as to whether to comply or risk an attack and suffer a public-relations nightmare.
Sentence.come: 2017年12月六级真题（第三套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: This idea is based on the principle that lions and other predators are far less likely to attack when they feel they are being watched.
Sentence.come: 2018年12月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section A

Sentence.sentence: Three-quarters of the world's flamingos fly over from other salt lakes in the Rift Valley and nest on salt-crystal islands that appear when the water is at a specific level一too high and the birds can't build their nests, too low and predators can move bri
Sentence.come: 2017年12月六级真题（第三套）阅读 Section C

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均有"进攻，侵略"之意。
means: aggression ：词义宽泛，既可指武装入侵别国领土，又可指文化、经济等方面的侵略。侧重敌意行动和征服的企图。
invasion ：多指具体的侵入或侵犯别国领土，也可用于指抽象事件。
assault ：主要指突然而猛烈的进攻。
attack ：普通用词，含义广，指事先不发警告，主动地向对方发起武力进攻或对言论等进行抨击。
offensive ：多指进攻的态势，常指大规模的协同军事行动。

stems_affixes.word_buile: tack钉子,接角→n.平头打 v.钉住
at加强+tack钉子,接角→n.&v.进攻, 攻击
tack钉子,接角→n.平头打 v.钉住

word_mean: 发作：疾病的发作或发生

Sentence.sentence: A young English teacher saved the lives of 30 students when he took control of a bus after its driver suffered a serious heart attack.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语浙江卷（11月） 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: In fact, women are less likely to have high blood pressure or to die from heart attacks.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语四川卷 阅读理解 七选五 原文

Sentence.sentence: In the 1960s, scientists proposed that predators at the top of a food web had a surprising amount of control over the size of populations of other species - including species they did not directly attack.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语天津卷 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

Sentence.sentence: Jacob Sattelmair from Harvard University has done a study into how much exercise is needed to lower the risk of heart attacks.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语全国卷I 听力 原文

Sentence.sentence: Scientists have found that all kinds of plants give out vocs when being attacked.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语全国卷2 阅读理解 阅读D 原文

Sentence.sentence: That night, hurricane sandy attacked the east coast, and rockaway was hit especially hard.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语北京卷 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: The prey species they directly attack will die out.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语天津卷 阅读理解 阅读C 选项

Sentence.sentence: The species they indirectly attack will turn into top predators.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语天津卷 阅读理解 阅读C 选项

Sentence.sentence: They are completely fearless and will readily take on a creature much larger than themselves, attacking in large groups and overcoming their target.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语安徽卷 阅读理解 阅读D 原文

Sentence.sentence: When a leafy plant is under attack, it doesn't sit quietly.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语全国卷2 阅读理解 阅读D 原文

Sentence.sentence: When a student attacks a professor on the social media, the language used actually says more about the student.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语全国卷3 阅读理解 七选五 原文

Sentence.sentence: When an individual ant comes under attack or is dying, it sends out an alarm pheromone to warn the colony to prepare for a conflict as a defense unit.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语安徽卷 阅读理解 阅读D 原文

Sentence.sentence: When faced with so many options, the lion chooses to freeze and wait instead of attacking the man holding the chair.
Sentence.come: 2014年高考英语全国卷1 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

sentences.cn: 他们知道什么时候进攻和什么时候撤退。

sentences.en: The enemy attacked us at night.
sentences.cn: 敌人在夜间袭击了我们。

means.word_mean: 攻击, 袭击; （在战争中使用武器的）进攻, 攻击

sentences.en: The enemy attack took us by surprise.
sentences.cn: 敌人的进攻使我们感到意外。

means.word_mean: 抨击, 辱骂; （口头和书面的）抨击, 非难

sentences.en: She had her first heart attack the other day.
sentences.cn: 不久前, 她第一次心脏病发作。

sentence.cn: 哈佛大学的雅各布·萨特迈尔做了一项关于需要多少运动才能降低心脏病风险的研究。
sentence.en: Jacob Sattelmair from harvard university has done a study into how much exercise is needed to lower the risk of heart attacks.
sentence.from: 2019年高考英语江苏卷 听力 原文

sentence.cn: 当绿叶植物受到攻击时，它不会静静地坐着。
sentence.en: When a leafy plant is under attack, it doesn’t  sit quietly.

jx.jx_en_mean: subject to aggressive, violent, or harmful action

lj.lj_ly: the north-western suburbs came under attack in the latest fighting.
lj.lj_ls: 西北郊在最近的战斗中遭到攻击。

entry.def: To attack a person or place means to try to hurt or damage them using physical violence.

example.ex: Fifty civilians in Masawa were killed when government planes attacked the town...
example.tran: 马萨瓦市遭到政府军飞机轰炸，有50名平民丧生。

example.ex: He bundled the old lady into her hallway and brutally attacked her...
example.tran: 他将老妇人推到她家走廊上，并对她一顿暴打。

entry.def: If you attack a person, belief, idea, or act, you criticize them strongly.

example.ex: He publicly attacked the people who've been calling for secret ballot nominations...
example.tran: 他公开抨击了那些主张用不记名投票方式确定任命人选的人。

example.ex: A newspaper ran an editorial attacking him for being a showman.
example.tran: 一家报纸发表社论，批评他善于作秀。

entry.def: If something such as a disease, a chemical, or an insect attacks something, it harms or spoils it.
entry.tran: （疾病、化学药品、昆虫等）攻击，侵蚀，破坏

example.ex: The virus seems to have attacked his throat...
example.tran: 病毒看来已经侵蚀到他喉部了。

example.ex: Several key crops failed when they were attacked by pests.
example.tran: 一些主要农作物由于遭受虫害而歉收。

entry.def: If you attack a job or a problem, you start to deal with it in an energetic way.

example.ex: Any attempt to attack the budget problem is going to have to in some way deal with those issues.
example.tran: 要解决预算问题，在某种程度上就必须解决那些问题。

entry.def: In games such as football, when one team attacks the opponent's goal, they try to score a goal.

example.ex: Now the US is controlling the ball and attacking the opponent's goal...
example.tran: 现在美国队控球，向对方球门展开了进攻。

example.ex: The goal was just reward for Villa's decision to attack constantly in the second half.
example.tran: 在下半场，维拉队持续进攻的打法为他们赢得了这个进球。

entry.def: An attack of an illness is a short period in which you suffer badly from it.

example.ex: It had brought on an attack of asthma.

means.word_mean: 1. (military) an offensive against an enemy (using weapons);

sentences.sentence: "the attack began at dawn"

means.word_mean: 2. a sudden occurrence of an uncontrollable condition;

sentences.sentence: "an attack of diarrhea"
"Clinton directed his fire at the Republican Party"
"the government has come under attack"
"don't give me any flak"
"attacks on women increased last year"
"they made an attempt on his life"

means.word_mean: 5. an offensive move in a sport or game;

sentences.sentence: "they won the game with a 10-hit attack in the 9th inning"

means.word_mean: 6. the onset of a corrosive or destructive process (as by a chemical agent);

sentences.sentence: "the film was sensitive to attack by acids"
"open to attack by the elements"

means.word_mean: 7. ideas or actions intended to deal with a problem or situation;

sentences.sentence: "his approach to every problem is to draw up a list of pros and cons"
"an attack on inflation"
"his plan of attack was misguided"

means.word_mean: 8. a decisive manner of beginning a musical tone or phrase

sentences.sentence: "he published an unexpected attack on my work"

means.word_mean: 1. launch an attack or assault on; begin hostilities or start warfare with;

sentences.sentence: "Hitler attacked Poland on September 1, 1939 and started World War II"
"Serbian forces assailed Bosnian towns all week"
"The editors of the left-leaning paper attacked the new House Speaker"

means.word_mean: 3. take the initiative and go on the offensive;

sentences.sentence: "The Serbs attacked the village at night"
"The visiting team started to attack"
"The mugger assaulted the woman"
"Nightmares assailed him regularly"

means.word_mean: 5. set to work upon; turn one's energies vigorously to a task;

sentences.sentence: "I attacked the problem as soon as I got out of bed"
"The cancer cells are attacking his liver"
"Rust is attacking the metal"

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from French attaque (noun), attaquer (verb), from Italian attacco 'an attack', attaccare 'join battle', based on an element of Germanic origin (see attach)

sentences.cn: 我们的“编辑优选”奖选出的冠军产品SimpliSafe 就利用了一种独特的系统，可以把偶然的射频干扰和故意的干扰攻击区分开来。

sentences.cn: 在采取适当措施把射频干扰纳入做测试的实验室里后，我们亲自测试了干扰攻击，并证实在用对了装置后可以成功进行干扰。
sentences.en: After taking appropriate measures to contain the RF interference to our test lab, we tested the attack out for ourselves, and were able to verify that it’s possible with the right equipment.
sentences.from: 16年12月四级真题（第一套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 干扰攻击是完全可能的。
